source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Build 20+ House Models: The Complete Low Poly 3D Tutorial

visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students

items.headline: Build and Color over 20 Multi-story Low Poly Houses and Import into Unity!​ Highly recommended for beginners!
objectives_summary: Create Low Poly 3D Art and Models
Make houses that you can combine like Legos to make mansions, buildings, & cities!
Learn to use Blender and navigate its awesome and expansive tools

items.title: Blender 3D - Master The Blender Interface
items.headline: Learn how to control blenders core features
objectives_summary: Easily understand how the blender interface works.
Create your own blender layouts
Access the User Preferences

items.title: Modeling a Sci Fi Dreadnought Character with 3ds Max

visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: Learn to Model a weaponized Dreadnought Mech for Games or Animation
objectives_summary: Students will learn to create and understand custom shortcuts and the advantages to utilizing them
Students will learn to explore a variety of techniques to create a moderately polygon-heavy mesh
Students will be able to use shortcuts to make a more efficient workflow.

items.title: Beginners Guide on how to create 2D Animations in After Effe

visible_instructors.name: Dorin
visible_instructors.title: Dorin Achim
visible_instructors.job_title: once ... I was chased by a bear

items.headline: If you wanna to be great in the 2D animation, this course will be useful for you.
objectives_summary: 2D Animations in After Effects
The workspace of Adobe After Effects
How to create shapes using the pen and shape tool

items.title: Shadow Analysis of Solar Plant in Google Sketch Up (RCC)
items.headline: Learn Design of Shadow Analysis of Solar Power Plant in Google Sketch Up with Prof. Kiran Beldar
objectives_summary: Introduction to Commands of Google Sketch Up
Introduction to Line, Rectangle and Circle Command
Pull/Push Command and Offset Command

items.title: Blender Materials Series 1.2 The Process Of UV Mapping
items.headline: The middle man between your textures and your materials that will help to create awesome looking 3D assets
objectives_summary: What Uv Mapping is used for
Where to locate Uv maps
How to apply a texture to a material using Uvs

items.title: Blender 2.8X Colour Correction In Compositing
items.headline: An introduction to colour nodes and basic compositing in Blender 2.8X
objectives_summary: Set up blender to begin compositing renders internally, no photo shop required
Adjust the hue, saturation and brightness of an image
Perform colour correction with pro level tools within Blender

items.title: Autodesk Navisworks 2021 (or earlier) - Clash Detection
items.headline: Become a Autodesk Navisworks Clash Detection pro! Also suitable for Navisworks 2017, 2018, 2019 or 2020
objectives_summary: Autodesk Navisworks Basics
Autodesk Navisworks Clash Detection
Clash Detective

items.title: Solidworks Course for Absolute Beginners (Step-by-Step)
items.headline: Ultimate SolidWorks Course for Absolute Beginners- Step-By-Step
objectives_summary: Create 3D models in SolidWorks
Create an assembly with multiple parts in SolidWorks
Create 2D drawings in SolidWorks

items.title: Building Information Modeling for Construction Management
items.headline: Learning BIM via Exercises in 3D Modeling, 4D Scheduling, 5D Cost Estimating, 6D Sustainability & 7D Facility Management
objectives_summary: Learn effective modeling and visualization techniques for presenting your designs.
Create 3D models of Architectural structures using Building Information Modeling elements that are virtual representations of the real world.
Create building models that more accurately reflect the construction techniques that will be used for the materials and systems specified.

items.title: Create Kinetic Typography with After Effects [fresh]
items.headline: Master Text Animation in a comprehensive manner
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create Kinetic Typography and Text animations in After Effects.
You will also learn various other animations like Trim Path, Book Text Highlight effect, etc.
You will learn how to create Isometric Text and Block Text effect

items.title: Houdini Game Tutorial - Procedural Fence for Unity

visible_instructors.name: Lucie
visible_instructors.title: Lucie Lescuyer
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional 3D artist and procedural modeling enthusiast.

items.headline: Learn how to create a procedural fence tool in Houdini and how to export it as a digital asset in Unity.
objectives_summary: This is a tutorial on how to build a procedural fence in Houdini and how to export it as a digital asset for Unity (It can also apply for Unreal).

items.title: Blender. Model, Texturize & Animate it. Basic 2 Intermediate
items.headline: Learn how to model a 3D project for a combat aircraft from the ground up!
objectives_summary: modeling: you'll be able to model any object of the real life, just like they are.
texturing: you'll be able to paint the model and give it the texture you want.
animation: you start the process of animating things and will understand, step by step, how to build your very first animation clips.

items.title: How to model a base mesh in Maya
items.headline: Create a low poly character in Maya suitable for games.  Learn exactly how to get started.
objectives_summary: Create a Character Base Mesh in Maya

items.title: Advanced Character Rigging and 2D Animation in Toon Boom
items.headline: Harmony Premium
objectives_summary: ADVANCED RIGGING AND ANIMATION IN TOON BOOM
Parenting rigging  methods in  TOON BOOM for 2D animation
2D character preparation for rigging

items.title: Game asset creation: highpoly to lowpoly workflow
items.headline: Highpoly & lowpoly game asset creation workflow using Blender and Substance Painter
objectives_summary: Understand the lowpoly and highpoly workflow
How to UVunwrap a mesh to avoid baking errors
Preparing and exporting a mesh in Blender for perfect bakes in Substance Painter
